gcc -pthread -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O3 -Wall -Wstrict-prototypes -I/home/jsanchez/include -I/home/jsanchez/.local/include -fPIC -I/usr/local/share/anaconda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy/core/include -Iinclude/ -Iclass/include -I/usr/local/share/anaconda/include/python2.7 -c pyccl/ccl_wrap.c -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-2.7/pyccl/ccl_wrap.o -O4 -std=c99
gcc -pthread -shared -L/usr/local/share/anaconda/lib -Wl,-rpath=/usr/local/share/anaconda/lib,--no-as-needed -L/home/jsanchez/lib -L/home/jsanchez/.local/lib -I/home/jsanchez/include -I/home/jsanchez/.local/include build/temp.linux-x86_64-2.7/pyccl/ccl_wrap.o -L/home/jsanchez/.local/lib -L/usr/local/share/anaconda/lib -Wl,-R/home/jsanchez/.local/lib -lm -lgsl -lgslcblas -lccl -lpython2.7 -o build/lib.linux-x86_64-2.7/_ccllib.so
